FunctionalRequirements.Name: Real-Time Health Monitoring with Critical Alerts
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must provide real-time health monitoring for multiple clients, with the ability to send critical alerts to the caregiver in case of anomalies or emergencies.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Simplified Client Management Dashboard
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must offer a simplified and intuitive dashboard for caregivers to manage multiple clients' care schedules, health data, and communication logs efficiently.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Secure Communication Channels
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must provide secure communication channels for caregivers to interact with clients' family members and healthcare providers, ensuring data privacy and confidentiality.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Offline Functionality for Remote Areas
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must support offline functionality, allowing caregivers to access and update client information even in areas with limited internet connectivity.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: High Usability for Caregivers
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must be highly usable for caregivers, with an intuitive interface and quick access to critical functions, even during busy workdays.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Robust Data Privacy Controls
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system must ensure robust data privacy controls, allowing clients and caregivers to customize data sharing settings and comply with privacy regulations.
